channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1242; 06:12PM; 7527 N Lasaine Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Pvyc6T; Lake Balboa; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. The seat of the fire was in an attached back patio and it extended into the attic and one room. The exposed, adjacent home was defended from damage. Primary and secondary of the home are clear. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E103 E273 E290 E293 E90 RA100 RA90 T73 T90 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1242; 05:53PM; 7527 N Lasaine Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Pvyc6T; Lake Balboa; One story single family dwelling with heavy fire showing from the back. Upon making fire attack, crews located fire on a back patio which is extending into the structure. ; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E103 E273 E290 E293 E90 RA100 RA90 T73 T90 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0956; 03:46PM; 1381 N Broadway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bKIV96; Elysian Park; 48 firefighters contained the fire (51 mins) and held it to less than 2 acres with no injuries reported. The defended the radio tower (important infrastructure) from any damage. Crews will remain on scene for approximately two more hours for the mop up operations. No further details.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E16 E2 E20 E201 E202 E203 E220 E25 E290 E4 E44 E47 E55 E9 E90 EA1 EM11 H2 H3 H7 HA2 HA3 HA7 HT3 RA1 T1 T2 T20 T3 T90; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0956; 02:55PM; 1381 N Broadway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bKIV96; Elysian Park; Approximately 1/2 light grass burning uphill (Radio Hill Gardens) with no wind.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E16 E2 E20 E201 E202 E203 E220 E290 E4 E44 E47 E55 E9 E90 EM11 H2 H3 H7 HA2 HA3 HA7 RA1 T1 T2 T20 T3 T90; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update CONTAINED Grass Fire; INC#0859; 02:22PM; 11300 N Bradley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/42ZtdhW; Pacoima; Firefighters have contained less than 1 acre grass fire and will handle mop up operations with the resources already on scene. No injuries reported. no structures damaged and no additional resources required. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E298 E7 E75 E77 E98 T98 WT77; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Grass; INC#0859; 01:50PM; 11300 N Bradley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/42ZtdhW; Pacoima; Approximately 1 acre of light grass burning alongside the WB118 Freeway. Traffic along with 118 may be impact by smoke, drivers are advised to take caution. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E298 E7 E75 E98 T98; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0767; 01:04PM; 12031 W Havelock Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/44mjt2B; Del Rey; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 21 minutes with no injuries reported. The sole occupant of the home was out prior to LAFD arrival and there are no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E263 E43 E62 E63 E67 E94 EA1 RA59 RA63 T5 T63; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0767; 12:43PM; 12031 W Havelock Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/44mjt2B; Del Rey; One story, single family dwelling with a well established attic fire. One additional task force requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and conducting salvage operations interior while making entry to the attic. Truck companies are conducting vertical ventilation. The house is clear of all occupants.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E43 E62 E63 RA63 T5; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0859; 01:55PM; 11451 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/2WZL3C1; Lake View Terrace; The first arriving fire companies quickly stopped all forward progress and contained the fire, holding it to 1/4 acre. There are no injuries reported. A portion of the resources will remain on scene for approximately 90 minutes for the mop up operation. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 BP74 E24 E274 E275 E290 E298 E7 E77 E8140 E89 E90 E98 EM15 H2 H3 H4 HA2 HA3 HA4 RA98 T74 T75 T90 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0859; 01:36PM; 11451 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/2WZL3C1; Lake View Terrace; Approximately 1/4 acre of heavy brush backing into an area of a previous burn. There are no structures threatened.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 BP74 E24 E274 E275 E290 E298 E7 E77 E8140 E89 E90 E98 EM15 H2 H3 H4 HA2 HA3 HA4 T74 T75 T90 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart
